version_description: - fix to bug with all night sound duration

- Sleep diary with personalized feedback & coaching
- Find your unique sleep age
- more adaptive sound cocoon
- more stable sound environment
- improvements to UI
- Bug fixes to make your personalized sleep diary even better!
- New design for the Alarms screen!

Your friendly Sleep Scientists & Designers were hard at work! Here's what's new in this update:
- More Dark Design across the app by popular demand!
- Fix for Vibration Wake--Enable this feature in Settings for a silent vibration-only alarm so you don't disturb your partner!
Happy sleeping!

- Improved sounds for your sound cocoon in your Sleep Habitat!
Happy Sleeping,
Sonic Sleep Team

Your friendly Sonic Sleep team has an update of bug fixes just for you!
Happy Sleeping :)

The Sonic Sleep team has been hard at work squashing bugs and listening to feedback in this release!
Happy Sleeping :)

Your friendly Sonic Sleep coders have prepped another update! We added a new, fun tagline to the Launch Screen each time you open the app to get you in the right mindset to sleep. We also swatted some pesky little bugs and improved the Diary for our Premium users!
Happy Sleeping :)

The Sonic Sleep scientists and designers created an even better Alarms screen for you in this update! Set a morning alarm to wake-up refreshed for work or school. Enjoy!
Happy Sleeping :)

The Sonic Sleep coders made an improvement to the Alarms screen. Set a morning alarm for work or school and wake-up refreshed!
Happy Sleeping :)
We made some major updates to our on-boarding screen, including a simpler login process that gets you using the sleep improvement features in Sonic Sleep faster!

We listened to your feedback and made the following changes:

- Fixes to connecting with bluetooth speakers and airpods
- Now the app will work completely offline!
- New Wind Down options and a faster way to play the wind downs any time
- Change to the sleep age algorithm
- Improvement to the Sound Cocoon volume with easier adjustments
- Interface improvements

Happy Sleeping,
Sonic Sleep Team

Hi Sonic Users,

We squashed some minor bugs in this version and made some small UI improvements.

Happy sleeping!

In this build we have done a complete app redesign with darker hues to reduce light exposure at night as much as possible when using Sonic as your alarm clock!

And now, create the perfect night of sleep with a meditation or relaxation track that fades into the Sonic Sound Mask. Then wake up the right way, with our Gradual Alarm.

We are now offering our premium users 1 free sleep consultation with a trained sleep coach! Just collect 7 days of sleep data and let Sonic Sleep do the rest.

Happy sleeping!

For those heavy sleepers, try the new backup alarm and hard alarm options to make sure you get out of bed in the morning! And now name your alarms for a more customizable sleep experience! Also, squashed some bugs =)

Major update to the sleep diary!

Now get more personalized and actionable sleep improvement interventions!

By popular demand, we introduced new relaxation sounds like the 528 Hertz miracle-tones. And now get additional options of Sonic Sleep Premium for a monthly or lifetime period.

Happy sleeping :)

Cheaper price for Sonic premium!

And now delete diary entries.

Apple Watch Integration! Get accurate sleep detection on your Apple Watch. Uncover changes in your body's physiology and sounds in your bedroom like snoring.

New onboarding and interface design!

An even better smart alarm clock.

Fixes to Apple Watch Integration! Get accurate sleep detection on your Apple Watch. Uncover changes in your body's physiology and sounds in your bedroom like snoring.

Improvements to interface design!

An even better smart alarm clock.

Uncover changes in your body's physiology with improved Apple Watch integration!

Improvements to the ideal bedtime reminder!

Added snore detection default sleep journey.

Bug fix with Apple Watch Integration.

Improvements to ideal bedtime reminder.

Improvements to accurate sleep tracking with Apple Watch.

And now a smarter smart alarm clock!
Further improvements to the Smart Alarm Clock.
More improvements to gradual wake smart alarm and wearable integrations.
- integration with dark mode
- Small GUI updates and continued improvements to our sleep diary. Record your dreams or behaviors in your diary and see how your habits impact your sleep quality!

- Improved on-boarding and UX
- Enhancements to the sleep score algorithm when connected to Apple Watch

- UI Improvements
- Apple Watch Heart Rate algorithm improvements
- More adaptive sounds
- improvements to sleep improvement sounds
- Improvements to Apple Watch integration
- More GUI improvements and fix to phone call interruption bug that could impact the sound masking technology
